item.title: asdf-clang-tools — A New Way to Install Clang Tools Using asdf
item.author: xianpeng.shen@gmail.com (Xianpeng Shen)
item.description: asdf-clang-tools is an asdf plugin for installing and managing Clang Tools, such as clang-format, clang-tidy, clang-query, and clang-apply-replacements.
